mapper.update:
update user
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_NAME = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_NAME = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATIONALITY = #{nationality,jdbcType=CHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECURITY_PASSWORD = #{securityPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL_VERIFIED = #{emailVerified,jdbcType=TINYINT},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_VERIFIED = #{phoneVerified,jdbcType=TINYINT},
COIN = #{coin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POINT = #{point,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OTP_KEY = #{otpKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTP_URL = #{otpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTP_VERIFIED = #{otpVerified,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECOMMENDER = #{recommender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOKEN = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOKEN_DATE = #{tokenDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PUSH_TOKEN = #{pushToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUSH_FLAG = #{pushFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SIGNUP_DEVICE_ID = #{signupDeviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_TYPE = #{loginType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_LANGUAGE = #{loginLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_DATE = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DELETE_DATE = #{deleteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EVENT_AGREE = #{eventAgree,jdbcType=TINYINT},
NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROFILE_IMAGE = #{profileImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_LANGUAGE = #{appLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSLATE_LANGUAGE = #{translateLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where IDX = #{idx,jdbcType=INTEGER}
